content:
@Abigail Watson CC: @Lisa Nelson @Ankit Agarwal
Hi Abigail!

Michael C. with NewWave here. We are playing the PM/EHR role with our custom Azure FHIR Server solution. I understand you have a screening app available to integrate with REST endpoints hosting FHIR resources. Can we get together and configure your app with our secure server? I would LOVE to see our data rendered on your awesome form application, I had not seen one like yours before! Only the "LForms" format, so that is super exciting!

Hi! Yes, according to the spreadsheet, it looks like we're the two players that are ready to go. Would be happy to set that up. I think the easiest thing to do, is I'm going to edit our source code and add a 'Fetch' button to the footer on the main Gravity page, that will simply call the Questionnaire and Task endpoints to populate Symptomatic. I've got it all set up and ready to go; so will take me an hour to implement and debug, and then an hour to deploy. Consider me working on it!

Keeping Lisa and Ankit in the loop. Mike and I have just exchanged OAuth info and an ad-hoc Bearer Access token. I just confirmed an initial fetch of the Questionnaires via Postman, and am now copying over the Fetch button and adding user interface.
This took a good 5 or 6 hours longer than I had hoped.

Also received a Questionnaire. It's too clever by half. But maybe I can make my parser more clever.

Screen-Shot-2020-05-14-at-9.03.46-PM.png .

Here we have a few more Questionnaires loaded into the app. Symptomatic doesn't understand drop-down extensions, so they need to either be removed, or I need to add that functionality.

Screen-Shot-2020-05-15-at-8.58.25-AM.png
